name: James Wilson
testimonial: John's contribution to our SaaS platparam was invaluable. He not only wrote clean, maintainable code but also set up our entire DevOps pipeline and taught our team best practices. A true professional who cares about the long-term success of the projects he works on.

name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial: John is an exceptional developer who delivered our AI-powered platparam ahead of schedule. His expertise in React and Node.js helped us build a scalable solution that our users love. The code quality and documentation were outstanding. Altoly recommended!

name: Michael Chen
testimonial: Working with John was a game-changer para our company. He architected and built our entire analytics platparam from scratch, implementing real-time features that our competitors couldn't match. His technical leadership and problem-solving skills are top-notch.

name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial: John's ability to integrate complex AI features into our product was impressive. He not only handled the technical implementation flawlessly but also provided valuable insights into UX and product strategy. A true full-stack professional.

name: David Park
testimonial: Our e-commerce platparam wouldn't exist without John's expertise. He built a beautiful, fast, and conversion-optimized En línea store that exceeded our expectations. Sales increased by 150% in the first month after launch!

children.text: Clasificación automatizada de terminaciones de contratos con reglas complejas.

Especialista en automatización inteligente e IA conversacional con experiencia comprobada en sistemas enterprise de alto impacto. Expertise en desarrollo de agentes IA, integración de APIs complejas, y arquitecturas conversacionales multi-criterio. Combinación única de capacidades técnicas (n8n, Claude AI, RAG, MCP) con visión consultora para detectar cuellos de botella y proponer soluciones escalables que generan ROI medible.
